neighbors.name: Joni E. Mclin
neighbors.claims: Joni E. Mclin is a real estate professional associated with West USA Realty, operating primarily in the Mesa and Gilbert areas of Maricopa County, Arizona ([Realtor.com](https://www.realtor.com/realestateagents/5683fa1189a68901006bbaf9)). While listed as a property owner in Cochise County, her primary professional footprint is outside the immediate project area ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/profile/jonisellsaz)). No public records of Mclin taking a formal stance on renewable energy development or serving in local Cochise County office were found as of January 2026 ([Cochise County Government](https://www.cochise.az.gov/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Non-resident real estate professional; no local roles

approach_recommendations.engage: As a real estate professional, Mclin likely prioritizes property value. Approach with data on solar's economic impact and ensure professional, transparent communication regarding land use.

neighbors.name: Grant D. Miles
neighbors.claims: Grant D. Miles is a resident of Cochise County, with records linking him to Huachuca City and Cochise, AZ ([Walbert Funeral Home](https://www.walbertfuneralhome.com/obituaries/davidc-houck)). He has been identified in public records as the partner of Debra L. Trate ([Reading Eagle](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/readingeagle/name/david-houck-obituary?id=15971321)). The parcel associated with his profile (106-48-001) corresponds to a residential property at 101 E Pinal St in Huachuca City ([Long Realty](https://www.longrealty.com/realestate/details/740423/101-e-pinal-street-huachuca-city-az-85616)). No evidence of Miles taking a public stance on development projects was found in local media or government minutes ([Cochise County Government](https://www.cochise.az.gov/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local resident; no known official community roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with a friendly, neighborly outreach. Verify his specific connection to the parcel (owner vs. resident) and listen to any concerns regarding local community changes.

neighbors.name: Rebekah Mourfield & Ronald L. Mourfield
neighbors.claims: Rebekah and Ronald L. Mourfield are residents of Cochise County, specifically associated with Benson, AZ ([OurStates](https://arizona.ourstates.org/dan-mourfield)). The parcel linked to this profile (106-48-002) is a residential property at 103 E Pinal St in Huachuca City, which has a history of recent sale activity in 2024 ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/AZ/Huachuca-City/103-E-Pinal-St-85616/home/114668280)). No public record of the Mourfields taking a stance on development or serving in local office was found as of January 2026 ([Cochise County Government](https://www.cochise.az.gov/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local residents; no known official community roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Given their residency in Benson and potential property interests in Huachuca City, verify their current ownership status of the specific parcel before deep engagement.
